data.system_settings: Android 4.4.4, Tablet Allview Viva H8 LTE
data.actual_result: The notes doesn't save if you don't do any action such as closing the profile, checking mutual
data.expected_result: The notes should save automatically, without needing to continue using the app/doing an action/closing the profile
data.short_description: Notes doesn't save when closing the app after adding them
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to someone's profile - Type a note - Without touching any other part of screen, press the back button to "close" the keyboard  - Press the recent apps button then close the app - Reopen the app, go to user's profile, and observe: the note was not saved
